data.name: Come Home - Jamie Clothing Expansion
data.detailed_description:
This optional DLC adds 4 new outfits for Jamie to wear on dates.

Park Date - Tied top and pink shorts
Movie Theater - Striped sweater
Jackson Burger - Low-cut pink blouse and jeans
The Grotto - Tight black dress

These outfits only appear while you are on a date with Jamie. In other scenes, she will be wearing her normal outfits.

This DLC is completely optional and not necessary for enjoyment of the game, but was added for those who want to help support the game through Steam. Hope you enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of sexual acts. All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are adults.
